content: Tendiamo a pensare che il nostro tempo sia proprio nostro solo di domenica e durante le vacanze.
translations: eng:We tend to think that our time is our own only on Sundays and holidays
eng:We tend to think that our time is really only ours on Sunday and during the holidays
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
